Headline: #79 79th and #169 69th/UPS Express Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Washtenaw
ShortDescription: Eastbound #79 79th and #169 69th/UPS Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Kedzie, 83rd, Western and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Washtenaw

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th and #169 69th/UPS Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Kedzie, 83rd, Western, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Washtenaw.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Wilson
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Wilson due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Attention Red Line riders, at this time, due to an unauthorized person on the tracks, trains are standing at/near the area of Wilson.

Consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
